name: Inventory
description: Adds an item manually to the inventory collection at the given index Not recommended unless you know what you're doing

methods.name: Item
methods.description: Converts all() to an Item array

methods.name: DropPattern
methods.description: Gets the dropping pattern for dropAll(Filter) Defaults to StandardDropPattern.LEFT_TO_RIGHT_THEN_DOWN

methods.name: getDropPattern
methods.description: Gets the dropping pattern for dropAll(Filter) Defaults to StandardDropPattern.LEFT_TO_RIGHT_THEN_DOWN

methods.name: setDropPattern
methods.signature: public static void setDropPattern​(@NonNull DropPattern dropPattern)
methods.description: Sets the dropping pattern for dropAll(Filter)

methods.name: widgetParentId
methods.description: Gets the basic inventory widget parent ID Basic meaning bank not open, GE not open, shop not open, etc

methods.name: widgetChildId
methods.description: Gets the basic inventory widget child ID Basic meaning bank not open, ge not open, shop not open, etc

methods.name: capacity
methods.description: Returns the capacity of your inventory (28)

methods.name: getInventoryWidget
methods.description: Gets the basic inventory widget Basic meaning bank not open, ge not open, shop not open, etc

methods.name: all
methods.description: Gets the items in your inventory

methods.name: isLoaded
methods.description: Checks if the Inventory Item Table has been successfully loaded within the client through our all() call

methods.name: slotInteract
methods.signature: public static boolean slotInteract​(int slot, @Nullable java.lang.String action)
methods.description: Interacts with specified slot in inventory

methods.name: deselect
methods.description: Deselects any item if it is selected

methods.name: interact
methods.signature: public static boolean interact​(int id, @Nullable java.lang.String action)
methods.description: Interact with an Item with specified ID in inventory

methods.name: drop
methods.description: Drops the item with specified ID from inventory

methods.name: dropAll
methods.description: Drops all items in your inventory.

methods.name: dropAllExcept
methods.signature: public static boolean dropAllExcept​(@NonNull java.lang.String... names)
methods.description: Drops all items that don't match the given names

methods.name: itemBounds
methods.description: Gets the slot bounds of an item.

methods.name: slotBounds
methods.description: Gets the bounds of a slot

methods.name: isItemSelected
methods.description: Checks whether an item is currently selected in your inventory

methods.name: getSelectedItemName
methods.description: Gets the currently selected item name

methods.name: getSelectedItemIndex
methods.description: Gets the index of the currently selected item.

methods.name: getSelectedItemId
methods.description: Gets the ID of the currently selected item.

methods.name: getEmptySlots
methods.description: Gets the count of empty slots in your inventory

methods.name: getRandom
methods.signature: public static @Nullable Item getRandom​(@NonNull java.lang.String... itemNames)
methods.description: Gets a random item that matches the item name(s) in your inventory

methods.name: isForceNoShift
methods.description: Forces the inventory to ignore whether shift interactions are enabled or not

methods.name: setForceNoShift
methods.description: Sets inventory to force no shift during dropping

methods.name: shouldShift
methods.description: Checks whether shift needs to be pressed for shift interactions Only implemented for dropping purposes

methods.name: fullSlotCount
methods.description: Full slot count.

methods.name: emptySlotCount
methods.description: Empty slot count.

methods.name: isSlotEmpty
methods.description: Checks if the given slot has an item in it or not

methods.name: isSlotFull
methods.description: Checks if the slot has an Item in it

methods.name: onlyContains
methods.signature: public static boolean onlyContains​(@NonNull java.lang.String... names)
methods.description: Checks if your Inventory only contains items with specified name

methods.name: slotContains
methods.signature: public static boolean slotContains​(int slot, @NonNull java.lang.String... names)
methods.description: Checks if the slot contains items that matches the given names.

methods.name: slotNameContains
methods.signature: public static boolean slotNameContains​(int slot, @NonNull java.lang.String sub)
methods.description: Checks if the slot contains items that matches the given ids.

methods.name: getFirstEmptySlot
methods.description: Gets the first empty slot in your inventory.

methods.name: getFirstFullSlot
methods.description: Gets the next full slot in your inventory

methods.name: getIdForSlot
methods.description: Gets the Id of the Item in the slot.

methods.name: getNameForSlot
methods.description: Gets the Name for the Item in the slot.

methods.name: slot
methods.description: Gets the slot for the item with specified ID.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds an item manually to the Inventory collection Not recommended unless you know what you're doing.

methods.name: toArray
methods.description: Converts all() to an Item array

methods.name: getItemInSlot
methods.description: Gets item in specified slot.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Gets the first item that matches the given item ID

methods.name: except
methods.signature: public static @NonNull java.util.List<Item> except​(@NonNull Filter<Item> filter)
methods.description: Get all items which do not fit the given criteria.

methods.name: contains
methods.description: Contains boolean.

methods.name: containsAll
methods.signature: public static boolean containsAll​(@NonNull java.lang.String... names)
methods.description: Checks if your Inventory contains all of the items with names specified

methods.name: isFull
methods.description: Determines if container full.

methods.name: count
methods.signature: public static int count​(@NonNull java.lang.String name)
methods.description: Count of all the items that match the search.

methods.name: set
methods.signature: public static @Nullable Item set​(int index, @Nullable Item element)

methods.name: combine
methods.signature: public static boolean combine​(@NonNull java.lang.String primaryItemName, @NonNull java.lang.String secondaryItemName)

methods.name: drag
methods.signature: public static boolean drag​(@NonNull Filter<Item> itemFilter, int toSlot)
methods.description: This will move the first matching item in the inventory to the provided slot. This will only move the first found item in the inventory, if you want to move a specific item to the slot, see swap(int, int) instead.

methods.name: swap
methods.signature: public static boolean swap​(@NonNull Item firstItem, @NonNull Item secondItem)
methods.description: Swaps the first of each item given if found, if you want to swap specific slots use swap(int, int) instead
